title: Confetti Gun
info: The Confetti Gun is a consumable novelty weapon that fires a cloud of colorful confetti, and inflicts no damage. Its effect is purely visual and causes no functional effect. Confetti Guns are consumed upon use, and can therefore be used only once. They are purchased from the Party Girl for 1 each.
stat:
